mapper.sql: m.id, m.chip_id, m.eqp_id, m.pseudo_code, m.lot_no, m.from_tray_id, m.from_x, m.from_y, m.to_tray_id, m.to_x, m.to_y, m.start_time, m.dm_id, m.dm_x, m.dm_y, m.judge_result, m.map_flag, m.experiment_chk, m.experiment_remark
mapper.select: SELECT mv.`id`, mv.`chip_id` AS chipId, mv.`eqp_id` AS eqpId, ec.`eqp_type` AS eqpType, IFNULL(cf.`tray_row`,1) AS trayRow, IFNULL(cf.`tray_col`,1) AS trayCol, mv.`from_tray_id` AS fromTrayId, mv.`from_x` AS fromX, mv.`from_y` AS fromY, IFNULL(mv.`to_tray_id`,mv.`chip_id`) AS toTrayId, IFNULL(mv.`to_x`,1) AS toX, IFNULL(mv.`to_y`,1) AS toY, mv.`to_z` AS toZ, mv.`judge_result` AS judgeResult, mv.`start_time` AS startTime, ec.down_eqp_id as 'nextEqpId', DATE_FORMAT(mv.start_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as startTimeStr, mv.pseudo_code as 'pseudoCode' FROM `map_tray_chip_move` mv LEFT JOIN `map_tray_config` cf ON mv.`to_tray_id` = cf.`tray_id` LEFT JOIN `map_equipment_config` ec ON mv.`eqp_id` = ec.`eqp_id` and ec.del_flag='0' WHERE `chip_id` = #{chipId} order by mv.`start_time`

select mv.`id`, mv.`chip_id` AS chipId, mv.`eqp_id` AS eqpId, ec.`eqp_type` AS eqpType, IFNULL(cf.`tray_row`,1) AS trayRow, IFNULL(cf.`tray_col`,1) AS trayCol, mv.`from_tray_id` AS fromTrayId, mv.`from_x` AS fromX, mv.`from_y` AS fromY, IFNULL(mv.`to_tray_id`,mv.`chip_id`) AS toTrayId, IFNULL(mv.`to_x`,1) AS toX, IFNULL(mv.`to_y`,1) AS toY, mv.`judge_result` AS judgeResult, mv.`start_time` AS startTime, ec.down_eqp_id as 'nextEqpId', DATE_FORMAT(mv.start_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as startTimeStr, mv.pseudo_code as 'pseudoCode' FROM `map_tray_chip_move` mv LEFT JOIN `map_tray_config` cf ON mv.`to_tray_id` = cf.`tray_id` LEFT JOIN `map_equipment_config` ec ON mv.`eqp_id` = ec.`eqp_id` and ec.del_flag='0' WHERE `pseudo_code` = #{pseudoCode} order by mv.`start_time`

select m.id,m.chip_id,m.eqp_id,m.from_tray_id,m.from_x,m.from_y,m.to_tray_id,m.to_x,m.to_y,m.start_time ,m.lot_no,c.down_eqp_id, c.eqp_type from map_tray_chip_move m left join map_equipment_config c on m.eqp_id=c.eqp_id where (chip_id is null and start_time > #{startTime} ) or (eqp_type=8 and start_time > #{srcTime}) order by m.start_time desc
mapper.update: update map_tray_chip_move m, trace_temp t set m.chip_id = t.chip_id where m.id=t.data_id
update map_tray_chip_move set chip_id=#{chipId} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select m.id,m.chip_id,m.eqp_id,m.from_tray_id,m.from_x,m.from_y,m.to_tray_id,m.to_x,m.to_y,m.start_time ,m.lot_no, c.same_lot_flag from map_tray_chip_move m left join map_equipment_config c on m.eqp_id=c.eqp_id where c.down_eqp_id=#{eqpId} and map_flag=0 order by m.start_time desc

select m.id,m.chip_id,m.eqp_id,m.from_tray_id,m.from_x,m.from_y,m.to_tray_id,m.to_x,m.to_y,m.start_time,m.lot_no from map_tray_chip_move m where m.eqp_id=#{eqpId} and map_flag=0 order by m.start_time desc
select count(1) from map_tray_chip_move m where map_flag=0
select eqp_id as "eqpId", down_eqp_id as "downEqpId", eqp_type as "eqpType" from map_equipment_config c where c.eqp_id like 'APJ%' and del_flag='0' and sort_no!=0 order by c.sort_no

select DISTINCT record_cnt as "recordCnt",plan.lot_no as "lotNo",c.eqp_id as "eqpId" from map_eqp_pro_config c left join aps_plan_pdt_yield_detail plan on plan.production_name=c.production_name where plan.lot_no in (SELECT DISTINCT lot_no from map_tray_chip_move where chip_id is not null and map_flag!=1)
mapper.update: update map_tray_chip_move mv, temp_chip_id tmp set mv.chip_id=tmp.chip_id, mv.map_flag=1 where mv.id=tmp.id
mapper.select: select date_format(begin_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') from map_tray_chip_log where tray_code=#{trayCode} and end_time is null order by begin_time desc limit 1

select dm_id as dmId, eqp_id as eqpId, GROUP_CONCAT(dm_x) as dmX,GROUP_CONCAT(dm_y) as dmY, GROUP_CONCAT(date_format(START_time,'%y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s.%S')) as startTime from map_tray_chip_move where chip_id=#{chipId} and dm_id is not null GROUP BY dm_id,eqp_id

SELECT col_name as "colName",default_value as "defaultValue",limit_min as "limitMin",limit_max as "limitMax" from edc_config_file_csv where file_type='PRODUCTION' and eqp_model_name=#{eqpModelName} order by sort_no

select ,c.eqp_id as 'from_eqp_id' from map_tray_chip_move m left join map_equipment_config c on c.down_eqp_id=m.eqp_id and c.del_flag='0' where m.map_flag=0 and m.eqp_id=#{eqpId} order by m.start_time

select ,c.eqp_id as 'from_eqp_id',c.interval_time_min,c.interval_time_max,c.same_lot_flag,c.sub_line_type from map_tray_chip_move m left join map_equipment_config c on c.down_eqp_id=m.eqp_id and c.del_flag='0' where m.map_flag=0 and to_tray_id=#{fromTrayId} and to_x=#{fromX} and to_y=#{fromY} order by m.start_time
select eqp_id,sub_line_no,sub_line_type,interval_time_min,interval_time_max,same_lot_flag from map_equipment_config where sub_line_type='E' order by sub_line_sort_no

select ,c.down_eqp_id as 'from_eqp_id',c.interval_time_min,c.interval_time_max,c.same_lot_flag,c.sub_line_type from map_tray_chip_move m left join map_equipment_config c on c.eqp_id=m.eqp_id and c.del_flag='0' where m.map_flag=6 and to_tray_id=#{fromTrayId} and to_x=#{fromX} and to_y=#{fromY} and c.down_eqp_id=#{eqpId} order by m.start_time

select ,c.down_eqp_id as 'from_eqp_id',c.interval_time_min,c.interval_time_max,c.same_lot_flag,c.sub_line_type from map_tray_chip_move m left join map_equipment_config c on c.eqp_id=m.eqp_id and c.del_flag='0' where m.map_flag=0 and to_tray_id=#{fromTrayId} and to_x=#{fromX} and to_y=#{fromY} and c.down_eqp_id=#{eqpId} order by m.start_time
mapper.update: update map_tray_chip_move set pseudo_code=experiment_remark where experiment_remark=#{pseudoCode}
mapper.select: select from map_tray_chip_move m where m.map_flag=0 and m.eqp_id='APJ-HB2-ASSEMBLY1' order by m.start_time

select , c.down_eqp_id as 'from_eqp_id',c.interval_time_max,c.same_lot_flag,c.sub_line_type,m.smt_count from map_tray_chip_move m left join map_equipment_config c on c.eqp_id=m.eqp_id and c.del_flag='0' where m.map_flag=0 and to_tray_id=#{toTrayId} and to_x=#{toX} and to_y=#{toY} and m.lot_no=#{lotNo} and c.sub_line_no='HB2' order by m.start_time

select , c.down_eqp_id as 'from_eqp_id',c.interval_time_max,c.same_lot_flag,c.sub_line_type from map_tray_chip_move m left join map_equipment_config c on c.eqp_id=m.eqp_id and c.del_flag='0' where m.map_flag=0 and to_tray_id=#{fromTrayId} and to_x=#{fromX} and to_y=#{fromY} order by m.start_time
select DISTINCT eqp_id,sub_line_no,sub_line_type,interval_time_min,interval_time_max,same_lot_flag,eqp_type from map_equipment_config where sub_line_no='HB2' order by sub_line_sort_no desc
mapper.update: update map_tray_chip_move set map_flag=2,chip_id=#{chipId} where pseudo_code=#{pseudoCode}
mapper.select: select from map_tray_chip_move m LEFT JOIN map_equipment_config c on c.eqp_id=m.eqp_id and c.del_flag='0' where m.judge_result='N' and m.map_flag='0' and c.sub_line_type='S' union select from map_tray_chip_move m where m.judge_result='N' and m.map_flag='0' and m.eqp_id='APJ-VI1' order by start_time
